Name: Eyewitness Hopper
About the game: Eyewitness Hopper is a runner-style arcade game. Where you have to jump up and down avoiding many enemies and obstacles in your path and gain points setting new records. Many enemies have different types of movements, be careful and don't bump into them! Along the way, you can collect stars that you can spend on skins for your character.
